A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If anybody tries to tell you that the last Jedi is a travesty and an insult to the Star Wars legacy\, then they have either never seen and understood the original trilogy or they are simply plain lying. The film is great fun and offer plenty of surprises\, without stepping too far outside series lore. True\, the humour is somewhat ham-fisted at times\, but the story\, performances and action are top notch and its a pleasure to report that the new recruits to the series from the Force Awakens are every bit as good as the original series stalwarts. Bots and haters be dammed\, the movie is darn entertaining...
